name: Pencil Portrait on Paper
description:
A high quality pencil portrait based on an image of your choice. 

Please follow these steps to make a purchase;

1. Find a good quality image that you would like the drawing to be of. Please refer to the sizes available in the drop down menu at the bottom of this page when selecting your image.

2. Attach the image to an email, along with details of the size that you want, your delivery address, and any other details (Deadlines, etc.), and send it to me at darrenj89@gmail.com. If you would rather send the image by post then I will provide you with my address on request.

3. When I have received your email I will assess whether the image is suitable. If it is I will then make you a delivery estimate based on my current schedule and email you to confirm.

4. After you have received my confirmation email and you feel that everything is ok, select your size from the drop down menu below, click on 'add to cart', and proceed to the online checkout.

5. Once I have received your payment I will begin your portrait and when it is finished I will send it to you via a courier.

Refunds and Deposit

I am certain that you will be very happy with your purchase, however if you are unhappy with the finished product then you are entitled to a refund.
Please be aware that the overall cost includes a 15% non-refundable deposit, this is to cover any costs incurred in the production of the portrait.

Postage and Packaging Costs

The price of postage and packaging is included in the overall price.
